attributes.action: Save BBC Asian Network and 6 Music
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Digital Radio Stations Music 6 and BBC Asian Network fills a void that no commercial station chooses to broadcast and is unlikely to do so. BBC Asian Network is an extremely fresh station that promotes cutting-edge debates, important in-depth reports and is on the top of first class entertainment. Music 6 has incredible access to all the BBC musical archives and an excellent choice of presenters, producers and musical formats. It would be a tragedy to loose these great resources. BBC cuts to digital Radio and Websites will be a step backwards when are have only just entered the digital age!

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government and so this is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
